movie.title: The King's Speech
movie.plot: The King's Speech tells the story of the man who became King George VI, the father of Queen Elizabeth II. After his brother abdicates, George ('Bertie') reluctantly assumes the throne. Plagued by a dreaded stutter and considered unfit to be king, Bertie engages the help of an unorthodox speech therapist named Lionel Logue. Through a set of unexpected techniques, and as a result of an unlikely friendship, Bertie is able to find his voice and boldly lead the country into war.

movie.title: The Black Dahlia
movie.plot: Lee Blanchard and Bucky Bleichert are former boxers-turned-cops in 1940s Los Angeles and, when an aspiring young actress turns up dead, Blanchard and Bleichert must grapple with corruption, narcissism, stag films and family madness as they pursue the killer.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 15 nominations.

studios.title: Equity Pictures Medienfonds GmbH & Co. KG III

events.title: Winter the dolphin is rescued from a crab trap

movie.title: Dolphin Tale
movie.plot: A story centered on the friendship between a boy and a dolphin whose tail was lost in a crab trap.
